body: Every intelligent magic item begins with the ability to see and hear within 30 feet, as well as the ability to communicate emphatically with its owner. Empathy only allows the item to encourage or discourage certain actions through urges and emotions. Additional forms of communication and better senses increase the item's cost and Ego score.
name: Senses and Communication
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Equipment/Rules/Artifacts and Other Items/Intelligent Items/Senses and Communication

sections.body: Empathy allows the item to encourage or discourage certain actions by communicating emotions and urges. It does not allow for verbal communication.
sections.name: Empathy
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Equipment/Rules/Artifacts and Other Items/Intelligent Items/Senses and Communication/Empathy

sections.body: An intelligent item with this ability can speak out loud using any of the languages it knows.
sections.name: Speech
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Equipment/Rules/Artifacts and Other Items/Intelligent Items/Senses and Communication/Speech

sections.body: Telepathy allows an intelligent item to hold private mental conversations with its wielder, regardless of their known languages. The wielder must be touching the item to communicate in this way.
sections.name: Telepathy
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Equipment/Rules/Artifacts and Other Items/Intelligent Items/Senses and Communication/Telepathy

sections.body: Senses allow an intelligent magic item to see and hear out to the listed distance. Adding darkvision or blindsense grants the use of those senses at the same range.
sections.name: Senses
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Equipment/Rules/Artifacts and Other Items/Intelligent Items/Senses and Communication/Senses

sections.body: The item can read script in any language, regardless of its known languages.
sections.name: Read Languages
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Equipment/Rules/Artifacts and Other Items/Intelligent Items/Senses and Communication/Read Languages

sections.body: An intelligent magic item with this ability can read magical writings and scrolls as if through read magic. This ability does not allow the magic item to activate scrolls or other items. An intelligent magic item can suppress and resume this ability as a free action.
sections.name: Read Magic
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Equipment/Rules/Artifacts and Other Items/Intelligent Items/Senses and Communication/Read Magic
